text: The Ministry of Mines (; abbreviated MOM) administers Burma's mineral resources extraction, production, and export policies. Ministry of Mines is currently led by Myint Aung, who was appointed by President Thein Sein on 7 September 2012. ==See also== * Cabinet of Burma ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Government ministries of Myanmar Category:Mining ministries Category:Mining in Myanmar
title: Ministry of Mines (Myanmar)
